channel.title: Out of memory error [ Runescource ]
channel.description:
Am i right in thinking the vps i have ordered hasn't got enough memory to run the server as it works perfectly on my computer when running but when i try and run on the vps it gets to loading map:
Then comes up with this:
INFO: Loading map... Exception in thread "ServerEngine" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at com.rs2.cache.map.LandscapeParser.parse(LandscapeParser.java:92) at com.rs2.cache.object.ObjectLoader.load(ObjectLoader.java:60) at com.rs2.Server.run(Server.java:170) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Everything is the exact same as it is run on my computer, has anyone come across this before? And found a fix?
It's runesource.

item.title: Out of memory error [ Runescource ]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So your server is using all available memory.
How much memory does your VPS have?

Read full topic

item.title: Out of memory error [ Runescource ]
item.dc:creator: @nathanz nathanz
item.description:
@nathanz wrote:

“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_17/bin/java.exe” -cp bin;libs/commons-compress-1.0.jar;libs/javac++.jar;libs/jdom-2.0.2.jar;libs/jruby.jar;libs/mysql-connector-java-5.1.20-bin.jar;libs/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;libs/xstream-1.4.1.jar;build/classes/model/content/skills/magic/; com.rs2.Server
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Out of memory error [ Runescource ]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

How much memory is on the VPS?
Also, how much memory is your server set to take up?
Right click the run.bat and hit edit.
Post it’s contents here

Read full topic

item.title: Out of memory error [ Runescource ]
item.dc:creator: @nathanz nathanz
item.description:
@nathanz wrote:

Am i right in thinking the vps i have ordered hasn’t got enough memory to run the server as it works perfectly on my computer when running but when i try and run on the vps it gets to loading map:

Then comes up with this:

INFO: Loading map…
Exception in thread “ServerEngine” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
at com.rs2.cache.map.LandscapeParser.parse(LandscapeParser.java:92)
at com.rs2.cache.object.ObjectLoader.load(ObjectLoader.java:60)
at com.rs2.Server.run(Server.java:170)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Everything is the exact same as it is run on my computer, has anyone come across this before? And found a fix?

It’s runesource.
